titleStmt.title: Be it enacted by this present Parliament, and by the authority thereof, that this present Easter term 1659. be continued to all intents and purposes, as if judges authorized by Acts of Parliament sate in Court.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament. And are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: the 14th of May 1659. Signed: Jo. Phelpes, Clerk of the Parliament pro tempore.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the seven Stars in Fleetstreet, over against Dunstans Church
